name: Universal Hero
overview: GASP! Only seven seconds left to save the planet! How will you fo it Burt? Universal Hero has to save his skin and everybody else's by finding bits to repair a shuttle to get to a planet to pick up the spares to med a space freighter which is out of control and about to blow him and his chances of getting back to earth to atoms. Get it? Get this! A totally nail-biting, multi-dimensional, hi-resolutional Awesome Arcade Adventure.
